title: 10 Min Guided Meditation For Sleep & Relaxation | Fall Asleep Fast With Soothing Rain Sounds
description:
Relax and fall asleep fast with this 10 minute guided meditation for sleep.  Soothing rain sounds will help your mind relax and help you fall into a deeper and more rejuvenated sleep through this peaceful music and spoken word guidance. 

This guided Boho Beautiful experience is a healing meditation, with spoken suggestions for mind and body relaxation, accompanied with a tranquil soundscape of gentle background sleeping music and calming sound of rain. This is the perfect way to give yourself the opportunity to let go of the day let go of stress, negativity, and worry to welcome a deep and restful sleep.

So find a quiet space, put some headphones on, close your eyes, and enjoy. 

🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 
https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

channelDescription:
Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.

If you're reading this I hope you know that you're worth it. You matter. Your life is important. You are strong. You are appreciated. You are loved. You are always enough. Smile. You're beautiful just being you and don't let anyone tell you otherwise. Sweet Dreams x 😘

When you’re young, you’re always worrying what other people are thinking about you.
When you reach middle age, you no longer care what other people think of you.
And when you’re old, you realise, everyone was just thinking about themselves all along.
May everyone have an amazing night good night everyone sleep tight😊❤
Sometimes I get so scared of being alone with my voice inside my head, but your wonderful words did magic. I cried a little. Maybe. <3
